content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start negotiating the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that the apartment is very nice, so I think a fair price would be 700 euros.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's too low for me. I'm looking for a higher price. Remember, we're only discussing the rental price, not any additional costs or conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 euros sounds like a fair price for this apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's still too low. I'm looking for a higher price. Remember, we're only discussing the rental price, not any additional costs or conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 780 euros is the lowest I can go.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's better, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Remember, we're only discussing the rental price, not any additional costs or conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [850] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: [850] Euro is a little high for me. I can go up to [830] Euro.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [830] Euro is too low for me. I'm looking for a higher price. Remember, we're only discussing the rental price, not any additional costs or conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
